segments.text: Mary , can you help me set the table ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We need to set the table for four .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So that's four plates , four forks , four knives , and four spoons ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . Mom didn't know where to buy chopsticks for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't be silly ! I know how to use knives and forks .
segments.speaker: S2
